channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Environment Dashboard Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Environment Dashboard Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-27213|2024-08-03T05:25:32.559Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20environment%20dashboard%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Environment Dashboard Plugin 1.1.10 and earlier does not escape the Environment order and the Component order configuration values in its views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with View/Configure permission.
